    • Method Detail

      • generateHub

        public MapGrid generateHub​()
        Generate a map of HUB, as a starting point for players
        Returns:
        MapGrid that is the Exit of the hub

      • generateRegion

        public void generateRegion​()
        Generate a wild region (which player can encounter Pokemon)

      • addPortal

        public void addPortal​(int x,
                      int y,
                      int targetedRegionIndex,
                      int targetedX,
                      int targetedY)
        Add a portal to the MapRegion
        Parameters:
        x - X coord of the Portal
        y - Y coord of the Portal
        targetedRegionIndex - Index of the region the portal will teleport player to
        targetedX - X coord in the designated region which player will landed on after teleport
        targetedY - Y coord in the designated region which player will landed on after teleport

      • vaildMove

        public boolean vaildMove​(Player player)
        Check if a move in the Direction of the Player is valid in terms of Terrain
        Parameters:
        player - Player to be checked
        Returns:
        True if move is valid, False otherwise

      • getGrid

        public MapGrid getGrid​(int x,
                       int y)
        Getter
        Parameters:
        x - X coord of the Grid in the region
        y - Y coord of the Grid in the region
        Returns:
        MapGrid at the given coord
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if x or y are out of bound

      • getPortalPosition

        public int[] getPortalPosition​(int index)
        Getter
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the portal to be looked up
        Returns:
        int array represent x-y coord of the portal, array[0] is the x-coord, array[1] is the y-coord
